title: error
body:
their is a error in opening my client plz help me it is "F:\League of Legends\libcurl.dll" is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error....... error status 0xc000012f
please help me
.....

replies.body: Make sure that you've got League installed on your primary drive (typically this is the C drive). If this isn't the case here, I'd recommend reinstalling League one the primary and letting me know if it runs normally then!
